page.title: 19Laurie Lee Interview (2)
page.content: Despite his love for the valley Laurie Lee sees the need for a small shop,post office,school and a village hall,so that people could meet for more events and form a stronger community.Also Slad needs a more frequent bus service so people could mix,rather than be secluded in those metal boxes called cars!. Laurie Lee also feels strongly about heavy goods vehicles driving through the village and would like to see them banned.He would like to see the valley unchanged well into the future.He hopes to have no more threat from Council road-side weed-killer,killing the plants and damaging the land which inspired him so much.
